Seer Skahi:
You'd be called a king if you had a throne! Here is your test. The Ketra Orcs, a lower race who betrayed us long ago, and the Varka Silenos are at war. They each have a* Divine Stone of Wisdom*, but you must earn their absolute trust to get it. Bring either stone to pass the test. Which side do you choose?
The Ketra Orcs The Varka Silenos
